disclaimer: Always consult a doctor before consuming any medicine.

medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.description: Used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever. Commonly used for headaches, muscle aches, toothache, and cold or flu symptoms.

medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.description: A non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce pain, inflammation, and fever.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.description: Used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, lower fever, and in some cases reduce the risk of blood clots.

medicines.name: Diclofenac
medicines.description: Used to relieve pain and inflammation in muscles and joints.

medicines.name: Naproxen
medicines.description: Used to relieve pain and inflammation, especially joint and muscle pain.

medicines.name: Mefenamic Acid
medicines.description: Used to relieve mild to moderate pain, including menstrual pain.

medicines.name: Cetirizine
medicines.description: Used to relieve allergy symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose, itching, and watery eyes.

medicines.name: Loratadine
medicines.description: Used to treat allergy symptoms including runny nose, sneezing, and watery eyes.

medicines.name: Fexofenadine
medicines.description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms without causing drowsiness.

medicines.name: Chlorpheniramine
medicines.description: Used to relieve symptoms of allergies and the common cold.

medicines.name: Antacids
medicines.description: Help neutralize stomach acid and relieve heartburn and indigestion.

medicines.name: Omeprazole
medicines.description: Reduces stomach acid production and is used for acid-related digestive issues.

medicines.name: Pantoprazole
medicines.description: Used to reduce stomach acid and relieve acid reflux symptoms.

medicines.name: Domperidone
medicines.description: Used to relieve nausea and vomiting.

medicines.name: Ondansetron
medicines.description: Used to prevent nausea and vomiting.

medicines.name: Loperamide
medicines.description: Used to control diarrhea symptoms.

medicines.name: Bisacodyl
medicines.description: Used to relieve constipation by stimulating bowel movement.

medicines.name: Oral Rehydration Salts (ORS)
medicines.description: Used to prevent and treat dehydration caused by diarrhea or fluid loss.

medicines.name: Electrolyte Solution
medicines.description: Helps restore fluid and mineral balance during dehydration.

medicines.name: Salbutamol
medicines.description: Relieves asthma and breathing difficulties by relaxing airway muscles.

medicines.name: Montelukast
medicines.description: Used to manage asthma and allergy-related breathing problems.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.description: Used to help control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.

medicines.name: Insulin
medicines.description: Used to regulate blood sugar levels in diabetes.

medicines.name: Amlodipine
medicines.description: Used to manage high blood pressure and heart conditions.

medicines.name: Atorvastatin
medicines.description: Helps lower cholesterol levels and reduce heart disease risk.

medicines.name: Vitamin C
medicines.description: Supports immune function and overall health.

medicines.name: Vitamin D
medicines.description: Supports bone strength and immune health.

medicines.name: Iron Supplement
medicines.description: Used to prevent or treat iron deficiency and anemia.

medicines.name: Zinc
medicines.description: Supports immune health and normal growth.

medicines.name: Calcium Supplement
medicines.description: Supports strong bones and teeth.

medicines.name: Magnesium
medicines.description: Supports muscle function, nerves, and energy production.

medicines.name: Melatonin
medicines.description: Supports sleep regulation and circadian rhythm.

medicines.name: Povidone-Iodine
medicines.description: Used to prevent infection in minor cuts and wounds.

medicines.name: Calamine Lotion
medicines.description: Relieves itching and mild skin irritation.

medicines.name: Hydrocortisone Cream
medicines.description: Relieves skin inflammation, redness, and itching.
